Title: The Feast of All Sinners
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Narducci, L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: The Mikaelsons find themselves out of options as they face the all-powerful and un-killable entity known as The Hollow. With the life of Hope at stake, Vincent proposes a final, desperate plan.
